name: HMSignificantTimeEvent
desc: An event that fires at a time offset from a significant time-based event.

items.name: init(significantEvent: HMSignificantEvent, offset: DateComponents?)
items.desc: Creates a new significant time event with the specified significant event and offset.

items.name: var significantEvent: HMSignificantEvent
items.desc: The significant time-based event that is used to calculate when the event fires.

items.name: var offset: DateComponents?
items.desc: The offset from the significant event that the event fires at.
